basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Clif Warren Writers Endowed Scholarship

description: In memory of Dr. Clif Warren, this scholarship will benefit deserving students pursuing a master's degree in Creative Writing. Dr. Warren was a former dean of the College of Liberal Arts and professor emeritus of English Literature, Humanities, and Creative Writing at UCO for over 40 years. A distinguished writer, critic, columnist, and television personality, Dr. Warren was a compelling advocate for the arts and intellectual freedom during his career. Eligibility Requirements Minimum of 6 hours in the Creative Writing master's program Maintain a minimum graduate GPA of 3.5 or undergraduate GPA of 3.5 for students just entering the Creative Writing MA program Proof of Admission into the Creative Writing MA Program Writing Sample of at least 15 pages, not to exceed 20 pages Preference given to previous recipient(s) of the Dr. Clif Warren Writers Endowed Scholarship
